intro: Philibertia stellaris, commonly known as the starflower, is a flowering plant native to South America. It belongs to the family Asteraceae, which includes daisies and sunflowers, and is characterized by its composite flower heads. The plant features showy, star-shaped yellow flowers that bloom in late summer to early autumn. Its leaves are typically narrow and lance-shaped, arranged alternately along the stem. Philibertia stellaris is often cultivated for its ornamental value in gardens and landscapes.
